parameters.name: ComputeResource
parameters.description: The compute engine used during execution. If it's not specified, the data source connection defined in the Spec will be used.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Description of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Hooks
parameters.description: The hook configuration after the data quality monitor stops.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The user ID of the owner of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The definition of execution parameters for the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The ID of the DataWorks workspace where the data quality monitor resides. You can obtain the workspace ID by calling the [ListProjects](~~2852607~~) operation.

parameters.name: RuntimeResource
parameters.description: The resource group used during the execution of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description: The Spec code of the data quality monitoring content. For more information, see [Data quality Spec configuration description](~~2963394~~).

parameters.name: Trigger
parameters.description: Trigger settings for the data quality monitor.
